short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts highlighted units to their imperial/metric opposite and displays in a tooltip.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adjust how long the tooltip displays for and its format by clicking on the extension button in the chrome extensions dropdown menu.

Conversion accessible through right-click context menu.

Currently supports:
°C <-> °F
kilometers <-> miles
kilograms <-> pounds
centimeters <-> inches
grams <-> ounces
